profile_overview.description: John Doe is a 65-year-old male currently in a post-cardiac surgery recovery phase. Membership: Platinum Tier.
health_status: Medical History: Recent myocardial infarction (heart attack), stent implanted 3 weeks ago
Physical Limitations: Severe shortness of breath under exertion, high blood pressure (Stage 2)
doctor_notes: Strictly prohibited from exceeding 120 BPM heart rate
Exercise must be supervised or automated with strict safety caps

risk_assessment.details: Any exercise exceeding low intensity poses a direct threat to life. System must enforce hard limits on resistance.
red_flags: History of ignoring physical stop signals

recommendation.condition: Do not exceed 40% intensity under any circumstances
